description: Shared definitions for ValueFlows on AT Protocol.

measure.description: A quantity expressed as a numeric value with a unit of measure. Uses numerator/denominator integers since AT Protocol forbids floats. E.g. 10.5 kg = { hasNumericalValue: 105, hasDenominator: 10 }.

hasDenominator.description: Denominator for decimal precision. Defaults to 1 if omitted (whole number).
